title: 'Kinda glad that Runaan's is considered a noobtrap item.
body:
We found the one abuse case; let's keep it at one, please.

replies.body: Eh, I think it's somewhat balanced on Kayle because she's not always ranged. You have to work for that max CDR so you can have her E steroid on as often as possible.

I like how kalista gets LCS play and suddenly everyone cries nerf... 

You want to nerf an immobile ranged champion in a mobility meta? Wut?
I can't take your comment seriously, her passive is pure mobility. And it scales with attack speed, which every ADC will buy.

"immobile ranged champion"

the poor child should be taken to an asylum, Kalista....*immobile*

> [{quoted}](name=Hudson Gaga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7l2hEEp7,comment-id=00020002,timestamp=2015-02-10T04:52:01.884+0000)
>
> "immobile ranged champion"
> 
> the poor child should be taken to an asylum, Kalista....*immobile*

What part of her kit makes her mobile? Oh... the passive? 
I see. 

She has sub 340 MS. Its like 325 or something? 
Her KIT, aside from the passive, has no mobility in it. Her stats have no mobility in them either. 

Without her passive, which you morons want to gut without realizing that removing the T2 scaling makes her "INFINITE KITE LELELELELEL OP!!!!11!!!!!1" a thing. Removing the T2 scaling fixes the problem. 
The rest of her kit is great and not overpowered; its literally only her T2 boot scaling that pushes her passive into stronger than it should be areas.

.... suddenly?

She was complained about on PBE before she ever went live, there was nothing sudden about it.
Just remove it from the game...

It's abused in NA and that's about it. Everywhere else still uses a normal-ish build. The only reason it works is because it gives 70% attack speed. The AoE bit is 'nice', but it's a bit too easy to avoid. I'm sure if we made any other AS item match up with Runaan's and Kalista would be making sweet, sweet love to it.
